overview: Join Catboy, Owlette and Gekko on their night time missions. Into the night to save the day!  Owlette learns that being part of the team means coaching Catboy and Gekko to defeat Night Ninja, who has been trained his Ninjalino's in Kung-Fu football.  Gekko wonders if he has what it takes to be good when the Wolfy Kids cause chaos.  Catboy learns to work as a team with Owlette and Gekko, as they thwart Romeo's plan to play a game of "pinball" in the city with wrecking balls.  Episodes: Soccer Ninjalinos Moonfizzle Balls PJ Pinball Bounce-a-tron The Good Wolfy Invisible Owlette
title: PJ Masks: Super Soccer Splat
